author: kingpanther13
releaseNotes:
v0.5.1 - Fix get_hub_logs JSON array parsing

v0.5.0 - Monitoring tools and device management:

- New get_hub_logs: access Hubitat built-in system logs with level/source filtering
- New get_device_history: time-range event queries with attribute filtering via eventsSince()
- New get_hub_performance: performance snapshots with CSV time-series trend tracking
- New device_health_check: detect stale/offline devices across all selected devices
- New delete_device: force-delete ghost/orphaned devices with comprehensive safeguards
- 64 MCP tools total (up from 59 in v0.4.x)

v0.4.8 - Fix Z-Wave/Zigbee endpoint compatibility for firmware 2.3.7.1+
v0.4.7 - Comprehensive bug fixes from code review (10 fixes)
v0.4.6 - Fix version mismatch bug in optimistic locking
v0.4.5 - Smart large-file handling (chunked reading, resave mode, sourceFile mode)
